about_the_game:
Immerse yourself deeper into the Lust Universe with special digital treats for the most devoted Cultists.

This collection of extras contains exclusive artwork behind-the-scenes, and other material related to Lust from Beyond, including:

  • Premium wallpapers that reflect secrets of the Lust from Beyond lore and present them using a wholly unique art style.
  • The Player's Guide, which dives into the lore and mechanics of Lust from Beyond as well as its art inspirations.
  • Dev Diaries, a series of 8 video interviews with Lust from Beyond director Michał Ciastoń. Learn about different aspects of the game, from inspiration to technicals.
  • The game's main theme in a music player-friendly format..

Available free to every owner of Lust from Beyond!

content_descriptors.notes: Lust from Beyond - Digital Goodies Pack contains sex and nudity, extreme and sexual violence and it's not suitable for viewers under 18.

name: Lust from Beyond - Digital Goodies Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
